body.p: “Observe a large mass of white lily root with the mud washed up “,” the woolly steel-blue root “,” with singular knobs for offshoots and long “,” large “,” succulent white roots from all sides “,” the leaf-buds yellow and lightly rolled up on each side.”
PE 10, pg. 293 / 4 January-23 April 1856 / NNPM MA 1302:26 / T vol. # XX / PDF # XIV / JVIII
